effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's Defense by six stages.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Defense by six stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
防御を　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta incredibilmente la Difesa di un Pokémon
in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Un dispositivo con forma de caja que almacena
las Insignias y la información relacionada.

Hebt den Verteidigungs-Wert eines Pokémon
im Kampf enorm an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem
Austausch des Pokémon.

Augmente fortement la Défense pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon
se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 방어를
엄청나게 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
ぼうぎょを　ものすごく　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

It raises the Defense stat of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte fortement la Défense pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
